**Why 5:** _______________________________________________________ **‚Üê ROOT CAUSE**

### Root Cause Category

‚òê **People** - Skills, training, communication, awareness  
‚òê **Process** - Inadequate procedure, not followed, unclear  
‚òê **Materials** - Supplier quality, wrong spec, storage  
‚òê **Equipment** - Failure, calibration, inadequate capability  
‚òê **Environment** - Workspace, conditions, organization  
‚òê **Measurement** - Inspection method, tools, criteria
